result.serving_suggestion: The vibrant tropical fruit flavours make this perfect for enjoying ice cold on a hot summer day while relaxing in a hammock.
result.tasting_note: This tropical infusion is bursting with fresh flavours of ripe pineapple and mandarin oranges. Good carbonation makes it light, crisp and refreshing, everything you want in a thirst quenching drink on a hot summer day.

result.tasting_note: Free up your blender and time with this ready to go piña colada. Offering all the classic flavour of pineapple and coconut with zesty lime and a refreshing/clean finish this is best served over ice with a slice of pineapple as a garnish.

result.name: Jackson-Triggs Merlot Bag in Box
result.tags: jackson triggs jackson-triggs jacksontriggs merlot bag in box wine red canada region not specified winery bagnbox
result.serving_suggestion: The dark and smooth flavours of this wine are an ideal match with barbecue fare.
result.tasting_note: The smoothness of merlot is allowed to shine in this single varietal expression. Starts with bright ruby colour, followed by aromas of blackberry, mocha and ripe plums. The fruit flavours resonate on the palate, which is dry and soft with a pleasing finish.

result.name: Beau's Lug Tread

result.tasting_note: Golden yellow colour with a thick head; aromas of fragant hops, citrus and roasted malt with yeasty tones; dryish, medium bodied, fresh, smooth and creamy, with forward hop and grain/cereal flavours; crisp and refreshing on the finish.

result.name: Molson Canadian
result.tags: molson canadian beer lager canada ontario molson's molsons brewery of limited can
result.serving_suggestion: Great on its own. Will also complement grilled white meats, seafood and sausage. Of course, always great with bar snacks.
result.tasting_note: Made from the very best ingredients and always preservative free. Pours a light golden colour with a soft fluffy head. Delicate floral and barley aromas with notes of citrus, grain and sweet fruit. Crisp, clean, medium bodied and smooth on the palate. Flavours of light hops, sweet malt and citrus. Pleasant hoppy finish.

result.tasting_note: Clear gold in colour with a thin head; aromas of apple, brown sugar and cinnamon on the nose. The palate is light with lively carbonation and subtle sweetness followed by a short and crisp finish.

result.name: Guinness Draught
result.tags: guinness draught beer ale ireland region not specified brewing worldwide can
result.serving_suggestion: Serve with Irish stew, meat pies or slow-cooked lamb shanks
result.tasting_note: This iconic beer is defined by its distinct and velvety character. Mahogany brown in colour with a creamy white head. Loaded with aromas of coffee, toasted malt and hops. Full and bold on the palate with a creamy texture and the same rich flavours, a delicate touch of bitterness adds pleasing balance to the finish.

result.name: Mott's Clamato Caesar Original
result.tags: mott's motts clamato caesar original ready to drinkcoolers ready-to-drinkcoolers readytodrinkcoolers coolers canada region not specified bottle
result.serving_suggestion: A classic that's well suited to any occasion. Simple to serve and easy to enjoy. Chill and pour over ice into a celery salt and cracked pepper rimmed glass. Customize it to your taste: add extra seasonings and spice it up. Garnish with a celery stalk or pickled green bean.
result.tasting_note: Canada's official cocktail has been a legend for over 50 years!  In 1969 both the Bloody Caesar and its key ingredient, Mott's Clamato were born. Now you can easily enjoy the complex, bold and savoury -- salty and herbal -- spicy and tangy, flavours of this classic cocktail in a ready-to-drink format. Perfect for anytime!

result.tasting_note: For well over 350 years, Kronenbourg has been brewing beer with distinction. This beer offers a slightly cloudy pale golden colour with aromas of floral, tropical fruit and honeysuckle. Crisp and palate-cleansing with flavours of citrus and white peach
